|關聯度| |v|v|关联度 > 100, 红色背景
 关联度 = 50 - 100, 黄色背景
 关联度 < 100, 绿色背景| |
items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
 *I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
 *So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.
h2. Criteria
 - Table UI Update
 - Column Sorting
 - Table Responsiveness
 - Data Formatting and Styling
 - Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update
 - *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
 - *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
 - *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
 - *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting
 - *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
 - *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (Last Login, Balance, Registration Date, Total, Total Deposit, Total Withdrawal, Total Bonus, Total Wallet Balance, Total Bet Amount, Total Win/Loss).
 - *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
 - *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
 - *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness
 - *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
 - *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
 - *And* The pagination should work correctly.
 - *And* The columns (Customer ID, Merchant Account, Associated Accounts, Status, Parent Agent, Total Bet / Total Winning, Operation Tag) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling
 - *Given* The table is displaying data.
 - *When* Numerical data is displayed.
 - *Then* It should be formatted with thousand separators and two decimal places.
 - *And* Negative numbers should be displayed in red.
 - *And* Positive numbers should be displayed in green.
 - *And:* If Association Score > 100, background color should be Red.
 - *And:* If Association Score = 50 - 100, background color should be Yellow.
 - *And:* If Association Score < 50, background color should be Green.

*Scenario:* Default Sorting
 - *Given* The data is loaded.
 - *When* The page first loads.
 - *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
 - *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

*Scenario:* Status display
 - *Given:* There are players that have different status.
 - *When:* The page first loads.
 - *Then:* When status is login allowed, it should show "Normal".
 - *And:* When status is login forbidden, it should show "Suspended (Password Error)"

h2. Reference
 - Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||
|Row No.| | |v|Table Header should be empty
 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page|Player Information, Header Section above Tabs|
|Account Status| | | |Status text should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Total Bonus|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Bonus|
|Total Deposit (Times)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit}
 (Thousand separator, two decimal places)Times| Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Times)|
|Total Withdrawal (Times)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal}(Thousand separator, two decimal places) \{Times}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Times)|
|Total Bet Total Win|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Bet / Total Win|
|Total Effective Bet|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Effective Bet|
|Total Win/Loss|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Win/Loss|
|Operational Label| | | |-|Player Information > Operation Label|
|Associated Items|New|v|v|-|-|
|Degree of Association| |v|v|Association Score > 100, Red background Association Score = 50 - 100, Yellow background Association Score < 100, Green background|-|
----

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家
h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
 *I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
 *So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。
h2. Criteria
 - 表格 UI 更新
 - 欄位排序
 - 表格響應式
 - 資料格式化和樣式
 - 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新
 - *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
 - *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
 - *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
 - *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
 - *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序
 - *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
 - *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（上次登入、餘額、註冊日期、總計、總存款、總提款、總紅利、錢包總額、總投注額、總輸贏額）。
 - *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
 - *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
 - *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式
 - *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
 - *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
 - *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
 - *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
 - *And* 欄位（客戶編號、品牌帳號、關聯帳號、狀態、上級代理、總投注/總中獎、運營標籤）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式
 - *Given* 表格顯示數據。
 - *When* 顯示數值數據。
 - *Then* 應使用千分位分隔符和兩位小數進行格式化。
 - *And* 負數應以紅色顯示。
 - *And* 正數應以綠色顯示。
 - *And:* 如果關聯度 > 100，背景顏色應為紅色。
 - *And:* 如果關聯度 = 50 - 100，背景顏色應為黃色。
 - *And:* 如果關聯度 < 50，背景顏色應為綠色。

*Scenario:* 預設排序
 - *Given* 數據已載入。
 - *When* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
 - *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

*Scenario:* 狀態顯示
 - *Given:* 有不同狀態的玩家。
 - *When:* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Then:* 當狀態為可登入時，應顯示「正常」。
 - *And:* 當狀態為禁止用戶登入時，應顯示「暫停使用(密碼錯誤)」。

h2. Reference
 - 欄位順序和詳細資訊：

|上級代理| | | | |玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上級代理 |

|上次登入| |v| |上次登入時間 + 上次登入IP
 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|

|總盈虧|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。負數：紅色；正數：綠色。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總盈虧|
|營運標籤| | | | |玩家用户详情 > 運營標籤|

 关联度 < 100, 绿色背景| |
items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
 *I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
 *So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.
h2. Criteria
 - Table UI Update
 - Column Sorting
 - Table Responsiveness
 - Data Formatting and Styling
 - Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update
 - *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
 - *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
 - *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
 - *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting
 - *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
 - *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (Last Login, Balance, Registration Date, Total, Total Deposit, Total Withdrawal, Total Bonus, Total Wallet Balance, Total Bet Amount, Total Win/Loss).
 - *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
 - *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
 - *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness
 - *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
 - *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
 - *And* The pagination should work correctly.
 - *And* The columns (Customer ID, Merchant Account, Associated Accounts, Status, Parent Agent, Total Bet / Total Winning, Operation Tag) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling
 - *Given* The table is displaying data.
 - *When* Numerical data is displayed.
 - *Then* It should be formatted with thousand separators and two decimal places.
 - *And* Negative numbers should be displayed in red.
 - *And* Positive numbers should be displayed in green.
 - *And:* If Association Score > 100, background color should be Red.
 - *And:* If Association Score = 50 - 100, background color should be Yellow.
 - *And:* If Association Score < 50, background color should be Green.

*Scenario:* Default Sorting
 - *Given* The data is loaded.
 - *When* The page first loads.
 - *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
 - *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

*Scenario:* Status display
 - *Given:* There are players that have different status.
 - *When:* The page first loads.
 - *Then:* When status is login allowed, it should show "Normal".
 - *And:* When status is login forbidden, it should show "Suspended (Password Error)"

h2. Reference
 - Column order and details:

|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|

Association Score = 50 - 100, Yellow background

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家
h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
 *I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
 *So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。
h2. Criteria
 - 表格 UI 更新
 - 欄位排序
 - 表格響應式
 - 資料格式化和樣式
 - 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新
 - *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
 - *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
 - *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
 - *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
 - *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序
 - *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
 - *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（上次登入、餘額、註冊日期、總計、總存款、總提款、總紅利、錢包總額、總投注額、總輸贏額）。
 - *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
 - *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
 - *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式
 - *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
 - *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
 - *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
 - *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
 - *And* 欄位（客戶編號、品牌帳號、關聯帳號、狀態、上級代理、總投注/總中獎、運營標籤）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式
 - *Given* 表格顯示數據。
 - *When* 顯示數值數據。
 - *Then* 應使用千分位分隔符和兩位小數進行格式化。
 - *And* 負數應以紅色顯示。
 - *And* 正數應以綠色顯示。
 - *And:* 如果關聯度 > 100，背景顏色應為紅色。
 - *And:* 如果關聯度 = 50 - 100，背景顏色應為黃色。
 - *And:* 如果關聯度 < 50，背景顏色應為綠色。

*Scenario:* 預設排序
 - *Given* 數據已載入。
 - *When* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
 - *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

*Scenario:* 狀態顯示
 - *Given:* 有不同狀態的玩家。
 - *When:* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Then:* 當狀態為可登入時，應顯示「正常」。
 - *And:* 當狀態為禁止用戶登入時，應顯示「暫停使用(密碼錯誤)」。

h2. Reference
 - 欄位順序和詳細資訊：

 不跟著排序變動| |

 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|

# TCG-93178: Risk Manager use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users

h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (Last Login, Balance, Registration Date, Total, Total Deposit, Total Withdrawal, Total Bonus, Total Wallet Balance, Total Bet Amount, Total Win/Loss).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (Customer ID, Merchant Account, Associated Accounts, Status, Parent Agent, Total Bet / Total Winning, Operation Tag) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *Given* The table is displaying data.
- *When* Numerical data is displayed.
- *Then* It should be formatted with thousand separators and two decimal places.
- *And* Negative numbers should be displayed in red.
- *And* Positive numbers should be displayed in green.
- *And:* If Association Score > 100, background color should be Red.
- *And:* If Association Score = 50 - 100, background color should be Yellow.
- *And:* If Association Score < 50, background color should be Green.

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

*Scenario:* Status display

- *Given:* There are players that have different status.
- *When:* The page first loads.
- *Then:* When status is login allowed, it should show "Normal".
- *And:* When status is login forbidden, it should show "Suspended (Password Error)"

h2. Reference

- Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||
|Row No.| | |v|Table Header should be empty
 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page| |
|Account Status| | | |All type status texts should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|
|Total Withdrawal (Count)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Count)|
|Total Bet
Total Win|New| | |\{Total Bet} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Total Win} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Bet / Total Win|

|Operational Label| | | | |Player Information > Operation Label|

Association Score = 50 - 100, Yellow background

- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (Customer ID, Merchant Account, Associated Accounts, Status, Parent Agent, Total Bet / Total Winning, Operation Tag) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *Given* The table is displaying data.
- *When* Numerical data is displayed.
- *Then* It should be formatted with thousand separators and two decimal places.
- *And* Negative numbers should be displayed in red.
- *And* Positive numbers should be displayed in green.
- *And:* If Association Score > 100, background color should be Red.
- *And:* If Association Score = 50 - 100, background color should be Yellow.
- *And:* If Association Score < 50, background color should be Green.

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

*Scenario:* Status display

- *Given:* There are players that have different status.
- *When:* The page first loads.
- *Then:* When status is login allowed, it should show "Normal".
- *And:* When status is login forbidden, it should show "Suspended (Password Error)"

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家

h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
*I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
*So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。

h2. Criteria

- 表格 UI 更新
- 欄位排序
- 表格響應式
- 資料格式化和樣式
- 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新

- *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
- *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
- *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
- *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
- *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序

- *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
- *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（上次登入、餘額、註冊日期、總計、總存款、總提款、總紅利、錢包總額、總投注額、總輸贏額）。
- *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（客戶編號、品牌帳號、關聯帳號、狀態、上級代理、總投注/總中獎、運營標籤）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *Given* 表格顯示數據。
- *When* 顯示數值數據。
- *Then* 應使用千分位分隔符和兩位小數進行格式化。
- *And* 負數應以紅色顯示。
- *And* 正數應以綠色顯示。
- *And:* 如果關聯度 > 100，背景顏色應為紅色。
- *And:* 如果關聯度 = 50 - 100，背景顏色應為黃色。
- *And:* 如果關聯度 < 50，背景顏色應為綠色。

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

*Scenario:* 狀態顯示

- *Given:* 有不同狀態的玩家。
- *When:* 頁面首次載入。
- *Then:* 當狀態為可登入時，應顯示「正常」。
- *And:* 當狀態為禁止用戶登入時，應顯示「暫停使用(密碼錯誤)」。

h2. Reference

# TCG-93178: Risk Manager use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users

h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家

h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
*I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
*So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。

h2. Criteria

- 表格 UI 更新
- 欄位排序
- 表格響應式
- 資料格式化和樣式
- 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新

- *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
- *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
- *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
- *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
- *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序

- *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
- *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（上次登入、餘額、註冊日期、總計、總存款、總提款、總紅利、錢包總額、總投注額、總輸贏額）。
- *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（客戶編號、品牌帳號、關聯帳號、狀態、上級代理、總投注/總中獎、運營標籤）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *Given* 表格顯示數據。
- *When* 顯示數值數據。
- *Then* 應使用千分位分隔符和兩位小數進行格式化。
- *And* 負數應以紅色顯示。
- *And* 正數應以綠色顯示。
- *And:* 如果關聯度 > 100，背景顏色應為紅色。
- *And:* 如果關聯度 = 50 - 100，背景顏色應為黃色。
- *And:* 如果關聯度 < 50，背景顏色應為綠色。

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

*Scenario:* 狀態顯示

- *Given:* 有不同狀態的玩家。
- *When:* 頁面首次載入。
- *Then:* 當狀態為可登入時，應顯示「正常」。
- *And:* 當狀態為禁止用戶登入時，應顯示「暫停使用(密碼錯誤)」。

h2. Reference

- 欄位順序和詳細資訊：

# TCG-93178: Risk Manager use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users

h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家

h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
*I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
*So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。

h2. Criteria

- 表格 UI 更新
- 欄位排序
- 表格響應式
- 資料格式化和樣式
- 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新

- *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
- *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
- *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
- *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
- *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序

- *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
- *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
- *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *When* 表格顯示數據。
- *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

h2. Reference

- 欄位順序和詳細資訊：

items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference

- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *When* 表格顯示數據。
- *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

h2. Reference

items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference

- Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||
|Row No.| | |v|Table Header should be empty
 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page| |
|Account Status| | | |All type status texts should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|
|Total Withdrawal (Count)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Count)|
|Total Bet
Total Win|New| | |\{Total Bet} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Total Win} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Bet / Total Win|
|Total Valid Bet|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Valid Bet|
|Profit|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Profit|
|Operational Label| | | | |Player Information > Operation Label|
|Associated Items|New|v|v| | |
|Degree of Association| |v|v|Association Score > 100, Red background
Association Score = 50 - 100, Yellow background
Association Score < 100, Green background| |

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家

h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
*I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
*So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。

h2. Criteria

- 表格 UI 更新
- 欄位排序
- 表格響應式
- 資料格式化和樣式
- 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新

- *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
- *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
- *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
- *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
- *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序

- *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
- *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
- *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *When* 表格顯示數據。
- *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- {color:#ff0000}Fix Version/s: TP-3153 Associated Users Phase 2 all the page of Associated Users, need the version switching function which Oriss requires like screenshot in attachments{color}
- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference

- Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||
|Row No.| | |v|Table Header should be empty
 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page| |
|Account Status| | | |All type status texts should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|
|Total Withdrawal (Count)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Count)|
|Total Bet
Total Win|New| | |\{Total Bet} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Total Win} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Bet / Total Win|
|Total Valid Bet|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Valid Bet|
|Profit|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Profit|
|Operational Label| | | | |Player Information > Operation Label|
|Associated Items|New|v|v| | |
|Degree of Association| |v|v|Association Score > 100, Red background
Association Score = 50 - 100, Yellow background
Association Score < 100, Green background| |

----
h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家

h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
*I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
*So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。

h2. Criteria

- {color:#ff0000}Fix Version/s: TP-3153 Associated Users Phase 2 關聯玩家的整個頁面，要有如附圖 Oriss 指定的切換舊版功能{color}
- 表格 UI 更新
- 欄位排序
- 表格響應式
- 資料格式化和樣式
- 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新

- *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
- *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
- *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
- *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
- *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序

- *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
- *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
- *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *When* 表格顯示數據。
- *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

h2. Reference

- 欄位順序和詳細資訊：
||欄位標題 (繁體中文)||新增欄位嗎？||可排序||左右滾動時固定顯示||格式/樣式||其他頁面相同的參數||
|列數| | |v|Table Header 空白，不用有字
 不跟著排序變動| |
|關聯帳號| | |v|點擊前往該帳號的玩家用戶詳情頁面| |
|帳號狀態| | | |狀態顯示的文字要同高級搜尋頁面|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 狀態|
|上級代理| | | | |玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上級代理 |
|註冊日期| |v| |已存在的註冊時間 + 已存在的註冊IP

|上次登入| |v| |上次登入時間 + 上次登入IP
 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|
|餘額| |v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 餘額|

|首存金額|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 首存金額|
|總紅利|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總紅利|
|總充值（次）|新增|v| |\{總充值}（千分位分隔符，兩位小數。）

items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
 *I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
 *So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.
h2. Criteria
 - {color:#ff0000}Fix Version/s: TP-3153 Associated Users Phase 2 all the page of Associated Users, need the version switching function which Oriss requires like screenshot in attachments, and default is old version{color}
 - Table UI Update
 - Column Sorting
 - Table Responsiveness
 - Data Formatting and Styling
 - Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update
 - *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
 - *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
 - *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
 - *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting
 - *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
 - *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
 - *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
 - *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
 - *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness
 - *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
 - *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
 - *And* The pagination should work correctly.
 - *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling
 - *When* The table is displaying data.
 - *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting
 - *Given* The data is loaded.
 - *When* The page first loads.
 - *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
 - *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference
 - Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||

 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page| |
|Account Status| | | |All type status texts should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
 Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|
|Total Withdrawal (Count)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Count)|
|Total Bet

|Operational Label| | | | |Player Information > Operation Label|

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家
h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
 *I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
 *So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。
h2. Criteria
 - {color:#ff0000}Fix Version/s: TP-3153 Associated Users Phase 2 關聯玩家的整個頁面，要有如附圖 Oriss 指定的切換舊版功能，預設是舊版{color}
 - 表格 UI 更新
 - 欄位排序
 - 表格響應式
 - 資料格式化和樣式
 - 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新
 - *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
 - *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
 - *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
 - *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
 - *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序
 - *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
 - *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
 - *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
 - *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
 - *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。

*Scenario:* 表格響應式
 - *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
 - *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
 - *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
 - *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
 - *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式
 - *When* 表格顯示數據。
 - *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序
 - *Given* 數據已載入。
 - *When* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
 - *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

h2. Reference
 - 欄位順序和詳細資訊：
||欄位標題 (繁體中文)||新增欄位嗎？||可排序||左右滾動時固定顯示||格式/樣式||其他頁面相同的參數||
|列數| | |v|Table Header 空白，不用有字
 不跟著排序變動| |
|關聯帳號| | |v|點擊前往該帳號的玩家用戶詳情頁面| |
|帳號狀態| | | |狀態顯示的文字要同高級搜尋頁面|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 狀態|
|上級代理| | | | |玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上級代理 |
|註冊日期| |v| |已存在的註冊時間 + 已存在的註冊IP
 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 註冊日期|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 註冊日期|
|上次登入| |v| |上次登入時間 + 上次登入IP
 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|
|餘額| |v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 餘額|
|首存時間|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 首存時間|
|首存金額|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 首存金額|
|總紅利|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總紅利|
|總充值（次）|新增|v| |\{總充值}（千分位分隔符，兩位小數。）
 \{次}|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總充值（次）|
|總提現（次）|新增|v| |\{總提現}（千分位分隔符，兩位小數。）
 \{次}|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總提現（次）|
|總投注
 總中獎|新增| | |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總投注 / 總中獎|
|總有效投注|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。負數：紅色；正數：綠色。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總有效投注|

設計圖：[https://iamcw8.axshare.com/#id=a0i30a&p=%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B61010&g=1]
items.toString:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
*I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
*So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.

h2. Criteria

- Table UI Update
- Column Sorting
- Table Responsiveness
- Data Formatting and Styling
- Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update

- *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
- *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
- *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
- *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
- *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting

- *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
- *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
- *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
- *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
- *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.
- {color:#ff0000}20250321 edited: sorting of Balance is separated to TCG-102105{color}

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness

- *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
- *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
- *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
- *And* The pagination should work correctly.
- *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling

- *When* The table is displaying data.
- *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting

- *Given* The data is loaded.
- *When* The page first loads.
- *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
- *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference

- Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||
|Row No.| | |v|Table Header should be empty
 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page| |
|Account Status| | | |All type status texts should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |{color:#ff0000}20250321 edited: -v-{color}| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. |Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
\{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|
|Total Withdrawal (Count)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Count)|

Total Win|New| | |\{Total Bet} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家

h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家

h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
*I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
*So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。

h2. Criteria

- 表格 UI 更新
- 欄位排序
- 表格響應式
- 資料格式化和樣式
- 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新

- *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
- *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
- *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
- *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
- *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序

- *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
- *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
- *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
- *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
- *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。
- {color:#ff0000}20250321 edited 餘額的排序另開 CR 單 TCG-102105 處理{color}

*Scenario:* 表格響應式

- *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
- *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
- *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
- *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
- *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式

- *When* 表格顯示數據。
- *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序

- *Given* 數據已載入。
- *When* 頁面首次載入。
- *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
- *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

h2. Reference

- 欄位順序和詳細資訊：

 不跟著排序變動| |
|關聯帳號| | |v|點擊前往該帳號的玩家用戶詳情頁面| |
|帳號狀態| | | |狀態顯示的文字要同高級搜尋頁面|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 狀態|
|上級代理| | | | |玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上級代理 |

 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 註冊日期|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 註冊日期|
|上次登入| |v| |上次登入時間 + 上次登入IP
 參考 玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 上次登錄|

|首存時間|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 首存時間|
|首存金額|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 首存金額|
|總紅利|新增|v| |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總紅利|
|總充值（次）|新增|v| |\{總充值}（千分位分隔符，兩位小數。）
 \{次}|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總充值（次）|

 總中獎|新增| | |千分位分隔符，兩位小數。|玩家用戶管理 > 高級搜索 > 總投注 / 總中獎|

h1. TCG-93178: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家
h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
 *I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
 *So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。
h2. Criteria
 - 表格 UI 更新
 - 欄位排序
 - 表格響應式
 - 資料格式化和樣式
 - 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新
 - *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
 - *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
 - *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
 - *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
 - *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序
 - *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
 - *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
 - *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
 - *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
 - *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。
 - {color:#ff0000}20250321 edited 餘額的排序另開 CR 單 TCG-102105 處理{color}

*Scenario:* 表格響應式
 - *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
 - *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
 - *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
 - *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
 - *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式
 - *When* 表格顯示數據。
 - *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序
 - *Given* 數據已載入。
 - *When* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
 - *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

h2. Reference
 - 欄位順序和詳細資訊：

h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
 *I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
 *So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.
h2. Criteria
 - Table UI Update
 - Column Sorting
 - Table Responsiveness
 - Data Formatting and Styling
 - Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update
 - *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
 - *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
 - *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
 - *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting
 - *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
 - *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
 - *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
 - *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
 - *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.
 - {color:#ff0000}20250321 edited: sorting of Balance is separated to TCG-102105{color}

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness
 - *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
 - *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
 - *And* The pagination should work correctly.
 - *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling
 - *When* The table is displaying data.
 - *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting
 - *Given* The data is loaded.
 - *When* The page first loads.
 - *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
 - *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference
 - Column order and details:

h1. -TCG-93178-: 風險管理員 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家
h2. Path

玩家管理 > 用户详情 > (Tab) 关联玩家
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* 風險管理員,
 *I want to* 使用更新為具有附加列和排序功能的新設定表格 UI 來查看關聯玩家,
 *So that* 我可以更有效率、更全面地檢視和管理資料。
h2. Criteria
 - 表格 UI 更新
 - 欄位排序
 - 表格響應式
 - 資料格式化和樣式
 - 預設排序

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* 表格 UI 更新
 - *When* 使用者導覽到頁面/模組。
 - *Then* 應顯示具有新 UI 設計的表格。
 - *And* 表格應包含下面（h2. Reference）列出的所有欄位，並按指定的順序排列。
 - *And* 指定的欄位應具有升序/降序排序功能。
 - *And* 分頁控制項應正常運作。

*Scenario:* 欄位排序
 - *Given* 顯示具有新 UI 的表格。
 - *When* 使用者點擊可排序欄位的標題（h2. Reference）。
 - *Then* 表格數據應根據所選欄位進行排序。
 - *And* 再次點擊同一欄位標題應在升序和降序之間切換。
 - *And* 應在欄位標題中顯示一個指示符（例如箭頭）以顯示當前的排序順序。
 - {color:#ff0000}20250321 edited 餘額的排序另開 CR 單 -TCG-102105- 處理{color}

*Scenario:* 表格響應式
 - *Given* 系統已準備好顯示帶有新表格的 CRM 頁面。
 - *When* 用戶打開頁面並在不同的屏幕尺寸上查看。
 - *Then* 如果設備的寬度不夠，表格應該顯示沒有水平滾動條，有些列可以折疊，但固定列不能。
 - *And* 分頁應該正常工作。
 - *And* 欄位（h2. Reference）應在水平滾動時固定。

*Scenario:* 資料格式化和樣式
 - *When* 表格顯示數據。
 - *Then* 應使用指定的格式／樣式（h2. Reference）

*Scenario:* 預設排序
 - *Given* 數據已載入。
 - *When* 頁面首次載入。
 - *Or* 更換參數搜尋後。
 - *Then* 表格應預設按「關聯度」降序排序。

description.1:
h2. Path

Player Management > Player Information > (Tab) Associated Users
h2. User Story Narrative

*As a* Risk Manager,
 *I want to* use the updated table UI with a new design of additional columns and sorting capabilities to check Associated Users,
 *So that* I can view and manage data more efficiently and comprehensively.
h2. Criteria
 - Table UI Update
 - Column Sorting
 - Table Responsiveness
 - Data Formatting and Styling
 - Default Sorting

h2. Acceptance Criteria

*Scenario:* Table UI Update
 - *When* The user navigates to the page/module.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed with the new UI design.
 - *And* The table should include all the columns listed in the bottom of this ticket (h2. Reference), in the specified order.
 - *And* The specified columns should have ascending/descending sorting functionality.
 - *And* The pagination controls should function correctly.

*Scenario:* Column Sorting
 - *Given* The table with the new UI is displayed.
 - *When* The user clicks on the header of a sortable column (h2. Reference).
 - *Then* The table data should be sorted according to the selected column.
 - *And* Clicking the same column header again should toggle between ascending and descending order.
 - *And* An indicator (e.g., an arrow) should be displayed in the column header to show the current sort order.
 - {color:#ff0000}20250321 edited: sorting of Balance is separated to -TCG-102105-{color}

*Scenario:* Table Responsiveness
 - *Given* The system is ready to show the CRM page with the new table.
 - *When* Users open the page and view on different screen sizes.
 - *Then* The table should be displayed without a horizontal scrollbar; if the device's width is insufficient, some columns can be folded, but not the fixed columns.
 - *And* The pagination should work correctly.
 - *And* The columns (h2. Reference) should be fixed (pinned) when scrolling horizontally.

*Scenario:* Data Formatting and Styling
 - *When* The table is displaying data.
 - *Then* It should be formatted with designated format and styling (h2. Reference)

*Scenario:* Default Sorting
 - *Given* The data is loaded.
 - *When* The page first loads.
 - *Or* Change the Parameters on the Search Form
 - *Then* The table should be sorted by "Association Score" in descending order by default.

h2. Reference
 - Column order and details:
||Column Header (English)||if it's New?||Sortable||Fixed when scroll left and right||Format/Style||Same Parameter on Other Pages||
|Row No.| | |v|Table Header should be empty
 Don't change order by any sorting| |
|Associated Accounts| | |v|Click and go to the Account's Player Information Page| |
|Account Status| | | |All type status texts should be the same as Advanced Search page|Player Management > Advanced Search > Status|
|Superior Agent| | | | |Player Management > Advanced Search > Superior Agent|
|Registration Date| |v| |Existing Registration Time + Existing Registration IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|Player Management > Advanced Search > Registration Date|
|Last Login| |v| |Existing Last Login + Existing Last Login IP
 Reference Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|Player Management > Advanced Search > Last Login|
|Balance| |{color:#ff0000}20250321 edited: -v-{color}| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Balance|
|First Deposit Time|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Time|
|First Deposit Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > First Deposit Amount|
|Promotion Amount|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Promotion Amount|
|Total Deposit (
 Count)|New|v| |\{Total Deposit} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Deposit (Count)|
|Total Withdrawal (Count)|New|v| |\{Total Withdrawal} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Count}|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Withdrawal (Count)|
|Total Bet
 Total Win|New| | |\{Total Bet} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)
 \{Total Win} (Thousand separator, two decimal places)|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Bet / Total Win|
|Total Valid Bet|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Total Valid Bet|
|Profit|New|v| |Thousand separator, two decimal places. Negative: red; Positive: green.|Player Management > Advanced Search > Profit|
|Operational Label| | | | |Player Information > Operation Label|
|Associated Items|New|v|v| | |
|Degree of Association| |v|v|Association Score > 100, Red background
 Association Score = 50 - 100, Yellow background
